sentences.sContent: Water, malt, hop and yeast are main components of the beer production process.
sentences.sContent_eng: Water, malt, hop and yeast are main components of the beer production process.
sentences.sCn: 泉水、麦芽、啤酒花和酵母是啤酒酿制过程中的主要成分。

sentences.sContent: Yes, I enjoyed the single malt they gave me, but I enjoyed the conversation much more.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes, I enjoyed the single malt they gave me, but I enjoyed the conversation much more.
sentences.sCn: 不错，我喜欢这种特别的麦芽酒，但是我更喜欢这种形式的聊天。

words.tran: 麦芽制造者；麦芽出售者
作成麦芽；用麦芽处理（malt的过去式）

trans.tranOther: grain, usually  barley  , that has been kept in water for a time and then dried. It is used for making beer,  whisky  etc.

trans.tranCn: 麦芽的；含麦芽的，用麦芽作的
